fullplot: Little Bear and Father Bear are camping in the woods when they meet a smaller bear named Cub. It seems that Cub became separated from his parents during a storm and now he can't find them. Little Bear and Father Bear decide to try to help Cub find his family.

title: The Little Bear Movie
